name: Run, Kaji!
description:
Run, Kaji is an endless runner I made for this years Kaiju Jam. In this game players play as a regular person named Kaji whose city is under attack by giant Kaiju monsters. Kaji must run away from them while avoiding obstacles or face certain doom!

See how long you can run and how many coins you can earn! Play again and again, endlessly! 

Made by Arissa Adams

Check out my portfolio at kaijugames.xyz

***DESIGNER NOTES***

There is a bug involving the Main HUD displaying on all screens. You will see the distance counter actively counting the characters movement from the very start of the game. I didn't get time to fix this before the Jam ended. The counter will reset when you load into the actual level so it will not affect your final score.

Thank you for playing!
